channel.title: Homes on R-Ladies Philly
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on R-Ladies Philly

item.description: About Us We are the Philadelphia chapter of R-Ladies Global, a world-wide organization that promotes gender diversity in the R community and in data science more broadly. While our group name does have ‘R’ and ‘Ladies’ in the title, we welcome all individuals who share our values and follow our code of conduct and who have an interest in data science, regardless of proficiency with R. Since our first meetup in January 2018, R-Ladies Philly has grown to a highly active, diverse and community-driven group, with:

item.title: Board
item.description: Meet our board members Darina Chudnovskaya, MSc Darina is a data analyst at a hospital in the Philadelphia area. She uses R to run statistical tests and build models for epidemiological studies with the goal of developing patient interventions for disease prevention. She grew up in Philadelphia. Darina joined R Ladies Philly to meet other R enthusiasts. Karla Fettich, PhD Karla works as Head of Algorithm Development at Orchestrall, where she leads behavioral data analytics efforts and predictive model development for healthcare IT innovation.

item.title: News
item.description: R-Ladies Philly has been featured in news and other media: 6/1/2018 - Podcast with The Data Lab 4/10/2018 - Interview with Wharton Customer Analytics Initiative 1/3/2018 - Article by technical.ly Philly

item.title: Sponsors
item.description: R-Ladies Philly is fortunate to receive support from several amazing organizations. Contact us to learn more about becoming a sponsor. RStudio R consortium WeWork Penn Dental Temple University Center City Drexel LeBow College of Business Penn Institute for Urban Research Orchestrall

item.title: Contact
item.description: Reach out by email if would like to help plan, sponsor, or host an event. We welcome volunteers!
